title: Private Military & Security Companies
name: Private Military & Security Companies
description:
A Map by Caatlondon

PMSC offices in London.

Some resources:
http://www.privatemilitary.org/pscs.html
http://www.sourcewatch.org/index.php?title=Private_Military_Corporations
http://www.publicintegrity.org/bow/default.aspx
http://www.corporatewatch.org/?lid=2182

properties.name: AKE Group, Gallery 4, Lloyd's Building, 12 Leadenhall Street, EC3V 1LP
properties.description: Posted by Caatlondon Formed by Andrew Kain after he left the UK’s SAS in 1991(Pipeline Magazine (September 2005)

properties.name: Aegis, 39 Victoria Street
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonAegis has had over 50 million of Pentagon contracts in Iraq.

properties.name: ArmorGroup, 25-28 Buckingham Gate, SW1E 6LD
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonEarned 33 million in Iraq in 2006 and won the UK govt.\'s £20 million annual contract for security services in Afghanistan in 2007.

properties.name: Control Risks Group, Cottons Centre, Cottons Lane, London, SE1 2QG
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonProtects UK Foreign Office officials as well as those from the Department for International Development

properties.name: Control Risks Screening Divison, Cambridge House, Cambridge Grove, Hammersmith, London W6 0LE
properties.description: Posted by Caatlondon\'Protects UK Foreign Office officials as well as those from the Department for International Development\' (Financial Times, September 2003). Sir Michael Rose, former commander of the SAS is a director

properties.name: Erinys International, 25 Grosvenor Street, W1K
properties.description: Posted by Caatlondon Granted a 00 million contract to guard oil installations and pipelines in Iraq.

properties.name: International Security and Surveillance Limited. Registered Office: 2 Lansdowne Row, Berkeley Square, Mayfair. W1X 8HL
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonOwned by ex-Special Air Service regiment operatives. NOTE: this address is for a FedEx office and IS NOT the office of ISS Ltd.

properties.name: Janusian, Russell Square House, 10-12 Russell Square, London, WC1B 5EH
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonProvides security for multinationals, in partnership with a wealthy Iraqi family.

properties.name: Kroll Associates, 10 Fleet Place, London EC4M 7RB
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonProtects the USAID mission in Iraq. A US-based company, but Aldwin Wight, a former head of the SAS, is chief of their operations in Iraq.

properties.name: Rubicon International, 70 Upper Richmond Road, London, SW15 2RP
properties.description: Posted by CaatlondonHandled UK recruitment for Erinys, and (October 2005) merged with AEGIS. \'Hires mostly from the SAS\' (Sourcewatch profile, February 2005). Bob Hodges, former commander of land forces in Northern Ireland, is a director.
